name: nativescript-textinputlayout
description: A NativeScript plugin to provide an XML widget to implement the Material Design TextInputLayout.

scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo; cd ../demo; tns run android
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo; cd ../demo; tns debug android --emulator --debug-brk
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd ../demo; tns run ios
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd ../demo; tns debug ios --emulator --debug-brk
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd ../demo; tns plugin remove nativescript-textinputlayout; tns plugin add ../src; tns install
scripts.setup: cd ../demo; npm install; cd ../src; npm run build; cd ../demo; tns plugin add ../src; cd ../src

author: Benedikt Veith <benedikt.veith@scherer-software.de> (https://github.com/benediktveith)
